Hiii, I'm truly sorry to hear about you experience with Far Cry 3 lately due to these technical issues. This sounds pretty frustrating and I'd really like to help limit how often your game is crashing with some troubleshooting. Here is a list of steps and workarounds that our teams have found to help. Please make sure everything has been tested if you haven't tried them yet: 

- Ensure the game is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- Run the game in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063445]Compatibility Mode[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure you have the latest version of Ubisoft Connect PC installed (Please note that Ubisoft Connect PC will launch in Offline mode if you have no internet connection. In Offline mode, the updates will not be installed automatically)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- Some [url=https://www.nvidia.com/en-gb/drivers/driver-rollback/]Nvidia[/url] players have seen an improvement after rolling back their driver version
- AMD users can find their [url=https://www.amd.com/en/support/download/drivers.html]driver versions[/url] on the official website
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If you're still dealing with these issues after you've tried the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. 185026421.review: «Я уже говорил тебе, что такое безумие? Безумие - это точное повторение одного и того же действия, раз за разом, в надежде на изменение. Это есть безумие. Когда впервые я это услышал, не помню, кто мне это сказал, я - бум - убил его. Смысл в том - окей? - Он был прав. И тогда я стал видеть это везде, везде, куда ни глянь, эти болваны... Куда ни глянь, делают точно одно и то же. Снова и снова и снова и снова и снова, и думают - сейчас все изменится. Не не не не, прошу, сейчас все будет иначе. Прости, мне не нравится, как ты на меня смотришь! Окей? У тебя проблемы с головой? Думаешь, лапшу тебе на уши вешаю?! Пошел ты! Окей? Пошел! На хуй! Все в порядке... Я успокоюсь, братец, успокоюсь. Really good game, and I love it a lot. Up there with far cry 5. However, I can't reccommend this game in it's current state. 

The best way to play this game would be the 360 version with the fps boost on modern Xbox. On PC, it is utterly unplayable. Any modern PC or Operating System will make this impossible to run without crashes. 

Any stability fix you find is only temporary. DX9 doesn't work (at least for me). Disabled d3d11 multithread, didn't work. any fix you can find will either work fine for you, or you will never be able to get it working.

 I get anywhere from 3 minutes of pre-crash gameplay to 1 hour. I love this game, I really do, but it just doesn't work on modern hardware.

184960744.developer_response:
Hey there, Sausy. I am sorry to hear that you keep crashing out of Far Cry 3. This is certainly a frustrating situation and I'd be glad to provide some troubleshooting if you'd like. Keep in mind that you may not need to follow all the steps if the problem gets fixed before you complete them all.

-[url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/installing-or-re-installing-ubisoft-connect-pc/000063173]Reinstall Ubisoft Connect[/url] to ensure  your version is fully updated. Older games may install an out-of-date launcher when installing the game due to how game files are added to Steam.
- Use [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/running-older-ubisoft-games-on-windows-10-and-windows-11/000063445]Compatibility Mode[/url]. While the game is supported on Windows 10 (Win 11 has similar framework), some players have found Compatibility Mode to resolve crashing issues
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-ca/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/disabling-the-ubisoft-connect-pc-overlay/000064954]Disable the Ubisoft Connect overlay[/url] and test the game again after restarting the client. 
- If using Discord, experiment with disabling the [url=https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/217659737-Game-Overlay-101]Discord overlay.[/url]
- Try all the steps listed in our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/troubleshooting-technical-issues-on-pc/000061047]basic PC troubleshooting article[/url] 
- In the article, you'll see a mention about checking system requirements. System requirements for Far Cry 3 are [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/far-cry-3/purchases-and-rewards/article/system-requirements-for-far-cry-3/000076773]here[/url]. Most players do meet them these days, but I like to include them just in case.
- Run an [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]SFC scan[/url] to check for any corrupt or broken files in your system. If broken files are found, select Repair and run the scan again.

Should the issues of crashing still persist, it would be beneficial to [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/en-US/Cases/New?method=Chat&platform=29&game=50003&category=219&hideFields=all&af=1&source=help]create a case[/url] on our Help Site and submit your system files ([url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-a-microsoft-system-information-report/000078753]MSInfo[/url] & [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/generating-a-directx-diagnostic-report/000078583]Dxdiag[/url]) so that the team can look deeper into this issue. Note that the MSInfo will need to be 10MB to upload to a case. If yours is too large, you can try compressing it to be a ZIP folder. Be sure to explicitly tell them what troubleshooting you have already tried to reduce the chance of repeated steps being provided.

184959076.developer_response:
Hey there Scoopy, I truly appreciate you reaching out wit this review for Far Cry 3. I'm SO sorry to hear about the crashes and freezes you've encountered and I understand how disappointing this can be when you're trying to enjoy your game. I'd really like to help smooth things out and improve your overall experience with some further troubleshooting. This is an exhaustive list of steps and workarounds that I've seen help with similar technical issues and I'd like to make sure we've covered all of our bases. For your situation (and in case someone else sees this while experiencing something similar) please note that if one method does the trick then you won't need to work through the rest and feel free to skip the steps you've already tried:

- Ensure the game is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- Run the game in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063445]Compatibility Mode[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- Some [url=https://www.nvidia.com/en-gb/drivers/driver-rollback/]Nvidia[/url] players have seen an improvement after rolling back their driver version
- AMD users can find their [url=https://www.amd.com/en/support/download/drivers.html]driver versions[/url] on the official website
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If your game is still crashing after you've tried the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

184945850.review:
СТОЙ!! рецепт вкусного борща;)
1.сварить мясо(варить 1 час в кастрюле)
2.нарезать капусту(на 2.5л воды 1/4 кочана капусты)
3.почистить 3 картошки, 1 морковь, 1 лук и 1 свекла.
4.добавить перец по вкусу.
5.нарезать картоху мелким кубиком.
6.натереть морковь,свеклу, лук мелко порезать.
7.при закипании мяса убрать пенку.
8.после закипания мяса добавить к нему крупных, мелкопорезаных веточек укропа.
9.добвить щепотку соли к мясу.
10.убрать огонь до среднего.
11.добать картошку в кострюлю к мясу и укропу.
12.варить это все 5-7 мин. после закипания.
13.во время варки мяса обжарить на сковородке лук(добавить растительного масла 1 столовую ложку. Лук должен слегка прозрачным)
14.добавить морковь к луку, а через 2 мин. свеклу.
15.томить овощи 4 мин.
16.после 7 мин. варки мяса с картошкой, добавить капусту.
17.добавить пережареные овощи к мясу, картошке и капусте.
18.добавить 2 лавровых листика и чуть чуть перца.
19.даждаться пока закипит, после убрать пенку.
20.убавить огонь меньше среднего.
21.добавить мелконарезаный укроп(если есть желание добавить мелконарезаную петрушку)
22.доварить на медленном огне 5 мин.
23.выключить огонь и дать настояться 10 мин.
24.положить в тарелку и попробовать наше хрючево
Приятного аппетита!!

184940267.review:
Выражусь кратко и понятно, эпохальный проект игровой индустрии, а главное самая лучшая часть в серии игр по Far Cry. И по сей день играть в нее не наскучивает. Ни секунды не жалею что уделил этой игре свое время. С уверенностью могу сказать что пройду ее еще не раз и не два а когда нибудь чисто для себя, чтобы вспоминать эту ностальгию. 

По моему мнению игра стоит на такой же планке, как такие игры как: Ведьмак, Фоллаут и многая целая вселенная качественно сделанных игр. Проходил игру на максимальном уровне сложности и это было круто. Те кто пишут и жалуются на баги, лаги, тобишь не возможно играть, мне же это абсолютно не интересно, игра заслуживает уважение ведь за столько лет она не чуть не скучна, а даже очень интересна и горяча в сюжете!

Гениально сделан как и геймплей таки сюжет несмотря на год выпуска данной игры. На самом деле многим разработчикам игр нужно подучиться у Ubisoft, потому что игра во всех аспектах ШЕДЕВР!

Итак, читатели данного обзора!

Если вы прошли эту игру и вы четко сидите улыбаетесь, то это значит что игра действительно принесла подачу тех самых эмоций которые и должны приносить игры.

184892580.review:
[h1]FAR CRY 3 в 2025[/h1]
Шел 2025 год. Бесконечно люблю эту игру! Единственный Far Cry который сделал мое детство...
Начал играть в эту игру на пиратке в далеком 2012 году на старом ноутбуке который еле выдавал 45 фпс на низких настройках. Когда появилось достойное железо решил отдать Юбикам кровные за такой шедевр. За все 13 лет проходил раз 10 точно. 
Божественный сюжет, наверное это единственная игра с достойным сюжетом у Ubisoft. Надеюсь новый ассасин поможет компании избежать краха. Очень жалко что остальные части серии мне не понравились, очень слабые сюжеты. Да и вообще ничего со времен 3 части не поменялось, все одно и тоже. 
Очень печально смотреть на будущее компании которая всрала серию. Пройдя все остальные части понимаешь, что такого сильного сюжета больше никогда не получишь(( Спасибо Юбикам за столько прекрасную игру. Все остальное превратилось в донатные помойки со скинами в одиночной игре за реальные деньги. Одновременно грустно и печально, но за игру спасибо! 
Завидую тем кто еще не играл в эту замечательную игру.....

184828625.review:
Far Cry 3 — це гра, яка по праву стала культовою завдяки своїй глибокій історії, яскравим персонажам і незабутнім моментам. Основна тема гри — божевілля — вплетена в сюжет через дії героїв, їхні рішення та світ, у якому вони опиняються. Легендарна фраза Вааса Монтенегро, одного з найяскравіших антагоністів у відеоіграх, звучить так: "Що таке божевілля? Це коли ти робиш одне й те саме знову і знову, очікуючи іншого результату". Цей монолог став знаковим і чудово передає атмосферу гри.

Протагоніст гри, Джейсон Броді, починає свій шлях як звичайний хлопець із багатої сім’ї, який опиняється на тропічному острові після невдалого відпочинку з друзями. Проте під тиском обставин він змінюється, проходячи складний шлях від наляканого юнака до впевненого воїна. Його протистояння з Ваасом та іншими лиходіями стає центральною частиною історії.

Антагоністи Far Cry 3 вражають своєю багатогранністю. Ваас — не просто злодій, а справжній уособлення хаосу. Його моторошна харизма і непередбачуваність змушують відчувати одночасно страх і захоплення. Другий ключовий антагоніст — Хойт Волкер — це уособлення жорстокості та прагматичного зла, який протиставляється дикій енергії Вааса. Кожен із них допомагає краще зрозуміти теми гри: моральну деградацію, втрату себе та боротьбу за виживання.

Не можна оминути і фразу про "ножик, ножик, хуйожик блін, шедевер", яку вимовляє Герк Дріфт, комедійний другорядний персонаж гри. Вона стала мемом серед гравців і гармонійно вписується в загальний тон гри, додаючи трохи чорного гумору до напружених ситуацій.

Far Cry 3 — це не просто стрілялка, а гра про вибір, божевілля і людську природу. Її персонажі, атмосфера і драматична історія залишають незабутнє враження, а знакові моменти надовго закарбовуються у пам'яті.

184797828.review:
This is one of the games of all time. In fact, it's one of the greatest open world fps games ever. It created an entire sub-genre within the gaming industry, and the story here rivals most action adventures you see on the big screen. This is the game that created the gameplay loop of "traverse through open world, find outpost, liberate outpost as you see fit, unlock cool rewards." This game is important to gaming, and is the best Far Cry game by far. 

It's a shame that Dylan O'brien is in his 30's now, because he would make a great Jason Brody in a live action film. Jeff Goldblum could have played Dr. Earnhardt, it would have been awesome. But instead we got that Uncharted movie.

184679761.review:
in Russian:

Я рекомендую Far Cry 3 всем, кто любит игры с открытым миром и сильным сюжетом.

Эмоциональная глубина истории, визуальная составляющая и напряженная атмосфера создают незабываемый опыт. Независимо от того, предпочитаете ли вы тактические бои, исследование или погружение в фантастику, эта игра предложит вам что-то особенное. Она выдержала испытание временем, даря свободу и радость, одновременно вовлекая вас в мир, который кажется как реальным, так и пугающим. Стоит попробовать!

Эмоциональная глубина Far Cry 3 ощущается через путешествие главного героя, где вы тесно связаны с его борьбой за выживание и развитие. Конфликт с такими персонажами, как Ваас, добавляет игре многослойности, поскольку главный герой и антагонист во многом похожи друг на друга, создавая постоянную внутреннюю борьбу. Эта связь, в сочетании с природой острова, которая является одновременно загадочной и опасной, усиливает общее ощущение угрозы и делает каждую победу и поражение личными.

Игра действительно выделяется своей свободой действий. Вы можете выполнять миссии любым удобным для вас способом — с использованием скрытности, в открытом бою или их комбинации. Реализация системы захвата точек, настройки радиовышек и системы крафта позволяет углубить игровой процесс и добавляет разнообразия. Контроль аванпостов дает вам власть над островом, в то время как автоматизация позволяет настроить игру под свой стиль.

Визуальная часть игры впечатляет. Переходы между мягкой красотой природы и внезапной опасностью держат вас в напряжении. Атмосфера острова великолепна: звуки дикой природы, шум качающихся деревьев и загадочная тишина ночи создают уникальный опыт. Райские виды, сочетающиеся с высоким уровнем напряжения, обеспечивают незабываемые впечатления.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

in English:

I recommend Far Cry 3 to anyone who loves open-world games with strong stories. The emotional depth of the story, the visuals, and the intense atmosphere create an unforgettable experience. Whether you enjoy tactical combat, exploration, or fantasy, this game has something for you. It has stood the test of time, giving you freedom and joy while drawing you into a world that is both real and scary. It's a good idea to learn more!

The emotional depth of Far Cry 3 is felt through the protagonist's journey, where you become strongly connected to his struggle to survive and evolve. The conflict with characters like Vaas adds layers to the scene, as the protagonist and antagonist resemble each other in many ways, creating a constant struggle within oneself. This connection, combined with the island's nature, which is both mysterious and dangerous, enhances the overall threat and makes each victory and defeat personal.

This game truly shines with its international freedom. You can complete missions in any way you like—whether through stealth, combat, or a combination of both. The implementation of a locking system for movement, radio tower setups, and a crafting system allows for depth and direction changes. Outpost control gives you control over the island, while automation lets you adjust to your liking.

The visuals are stunning, and the way the environment shifts between gentle beauty and terrifying danger keeps you alert. The atmosphere on the island is spectacular, with the sounds of wildlife, the swaying trees, and the mysterious silence of the night contributing to the experience. Paradise-like views combined with high stakes provide an unforgettable experience.

184612685.review:
A decade and more on, this is the Far Cry everyone seems to remember, and for good reason: it is probably the most thought-provoking of any Far Cry game (to say nothing of open-world games and FPS games in general) in its exploration of the human psyche. The narrative, though simplistic, is by far more interesting than later games in the series. Jason Brody is hardly a sympathetic protagonist, but his journey taps into a primal part of our nature that few of us actually engage with in our world full of conveniences and comforts. When you really get down to it, the human experience, for the vast majority of our history, was defined by hardship. It is only within the last handful of generations that most people on earth have managed to escape subsistence living, and on an evolutionary timeline, that might as well be the blink of an eye. Although we generally seek to make our lives as easy as possible, the truth is that hardship gives us direction and purpose, and we struggle to cope with a lack of it. Ennui is pernicious. We aren't built for comfort, we are built to survive, adapt, and overcome adversity, and some part of us yearns for that at the very core of our being. Even in its stylism and over-the-top-ness, Far Cry 3 delves into that facet of our humanity.

Jason Brody is the avatar through which we experience our own journey through hell. At first we are forced to do terrible things to survive and to save those we care about; then, at some point later, we find ourselves willfully doing terrible things because we can, and we relish in it. We have become the monster, but the descent into savagery and madness also comes with a taste of godhood. What awaits us in the end? By the time we get there we are in truth a completely different person than we were at the beginning, and there's no going back. The choice we face in the final moments of the journey is a profound one: either way, a part of us dies.

Gameplay-wise, Far Cry 3 has aged very well indeed. Exploring the game world remains a joy, as does capturing the outposts in order to steadily take over the map (and then resetting them to hostile in order to do it again), and the main story quests are always a trip even after the first playthrough. The combat still feels good, too. The game isn't perfect, though, of course. Some of the platforming is clunky and unintuitive, and much of the side content is uninspired and tedious. And, of course, you have to deal with Ubi's proprietary shell just to play, which is supremely annoying.

If you're willing to put up with the above, Far Cry 3 is still one heck of a thrill ride. To this day, it remains the best game in the series.

Hi there, I am really sorry to hear about all these crashes you've been dealing with while trying to play Far Cry 3. This sounds pretty frustrating and I'd really like to help improve your overall situation with some troubleshooting. Please make sure everything has been tested if you haven't tried them yet:

- Ensure the game is installed on the same drive as both Steam and Ubisoft Connect
- Run the game in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063445]Compatibility Mode[/url]
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000060529]Verify[/url] the game files
- [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000063761]Clean boot[/url] to rule out background processes that could be conflicting (Overwolf, Steel Series, Corsair, iCue3, Razer, Synapse, etc.)
- Make sure that Ubisoft Connect PC is not being [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/preventing-software-conflicts-with-ubisoft-games/000061015]blocked[/url] by any security software you have, such as a firewall or anti-virus. 
- Clear the cache in [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6AD7-820D-8BE5-E51F#:~:text=From%20your%20Steam%20Client%2C%20open,Cache%22%20button%20at%20the%20bottom.]Steam[/url]
- Clear the cache in [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]Ubisoft Connect[/url]
- Run [url=https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e]Microsoft's System File Checker tool[/url]to repair any missing or corrupted files
- Reinstall the [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000062655]supporting software[/url] for the game
- Some [url=https://www.nvidia.com/en-gb/drivers/driver-rollback/]Nvidia[/url] players have seen an improvement after rolling back their driver version
- AMD users can find their [url=https://www.amd.com/en/support/download/drivers.html]driver versions[/url] on the official website
- Complete [url=https://support.ubisoft.com/Article/000061047]our guide[/url] here

If you're still experiencing these crashes after you've tried the suggested instructions, I encourage you to create a ticket on our [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/company/contact-us]Help website[/url] and include your [url= https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061449]system files[/url] in the attachments. Make sure to fully explain the issue and specify exactly what troubleshooting steps you have tried so far to reduce the chance for repeated steps. Our support team will receive everything and then contact you to proceed. Thank you!

I got the game about 3 years ago, but it didn't really click with me so i refunded it. 10/10 Probably the best singleplayer story I've ever played through.

当之无愧的里程碑作品。

我第一次接触它的时候可能还在上小学，时隔多年，这部游戏无论是从剧情，音乐还是射击感受给我的震撼未曾减退。
玩法上潜行和强袭都很有特色，我非常享受慢慢思考如何在不惊动敌人的情况下对他们逐个击破(虽然太菜了据点大部分是用狙击枪狙完的)，而剧情中的强袭任务也非常劲爆。
美术方面，风格化的UI，疯狂的绿色地狱，多样的野兽和一众亡命徒，作为一款老游戏它的代入感仍然比我玩过的很多晚于它的游戏还要好。随着结局来临，死去的恋人，远去的朋友，没有首领的孤岛，只剩下了孤独而疯狂的主角。杰森变成了怪物，一切都对应上了范斯之前疯狂的话语，命运如同当初撕裂范斯般撕裂了杰森。

那首far cry 3响起，是那样的愤怒，那样的孤独，而又无人诉说，无处发泄。

184208066.review: Версии для XBOX 360 и XBOX ONE - отличные игры. Прошел каждую с большим удовольствие, но версия для PC это какой-то стыд и позор. Приложение постоянно вылетает. Просто глюк на глюке. Я не знаю, что за чудо разработчики писали код для Windows, и еще сложней мне понять, почему за столько лет никто так и не смог исправить все эти баги, но я сдаюсь. Пройти ее нереально. И пожалуйста, не говорите, что у меня компьютер плохой или что Windows 11 бракованный. Ни с железом, ни с ОС нет никаких проблем не наблюдается ни в одной другой игре из всей моей коллекции на Steam-е. Даже Cyberpunk 2077 который все так ругали на релизе за глюки, всегда работал без каких либо проблем. Эта же поделка от Ubisoft - просто деньги на ветер. Очень жаль что нельзя сделать рифанд, а так же, потребовать денежную компенсацию за убитые нервные клетки. Крайне не рекомендую покупать этот хлам. Повторюсь - версии для консолей великолепны. Скажу больше, FarCry 3, это моя любимая игра. Но ключевое слово здесь - ИГРА, ибо приложение для PC - это все, что угодно, но игрой оно точно не является.

184044544.developer_response:
Hey Jota, so sorry to hear that you haven't been able to play Far Cry 3. I understand how aggravating this can be when all you want to do is play the game. I'd be glad to share some information that can clear up this issue. 

The [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/ownership-authentication-error-in-ubisoft-connect-pc-when-launching-game-through-steam/000066178]"authenticating ownership"[/url] request can be triggered by one of two issues. Most commonly, this occurs if you're trying to launch the game through Steam with the wrong Ubisoft account logged in, which could happen if you've accidentally created a new account with a misspelled email, or vice versa. In rare cases, the request might appear due to installation or patch file corruption. Reinstalling the game can resolve this by replacing old files with fresh ones. You can also try relogging into both Steam and Ubisoft Connect, [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/0C48-FCBD-DA71-93EB]verifying your Steam files,[/url] and [url=https://www.ubisoft.com/en-gb/help/connectivity-and-performance/article/emptying-the-cache-of-ubisoft-connect-pc/000061966]clearing the cache in Ubisoft Connect.[/url]

If the problem continues or you're unsure if an alternate account was created (such as through a misspelled email), please contact Ubisoft Support through the [url=https://ubi.li/l8Ber]Help Site[/url]. Provide them with:

- your [url=https://ubi.li/JV083]launcher logs[/url]
- an uncropped screenshot of your [url=https://ubi.li/Xc8ie]Steam Proof of Purchase[/url]
- your [url=https://ubi.li/5pKwq]Steam ID[/url]

183995508.review:
If you’re in the mood for a wild ride through an island filled with chaos, psychotic drug lords, and the occasional tiger that just wants to eat your face, then Far Cry 3 is exactly the kind of tropical vacation you’ve been looking for. From the moment you crash-land on the island and hear the wild screams of the locals (not to mention the sound of explosions in the distance), you’ll know you’re in for one heck of a time. The game’s open-world sandbox is a playground of insanity, where you can either follow the main story or just go off and hunt a shark with a bow and arrow for absolutely no reason other than it feels amazing. There’s something incredibly satisfying about being able to drop-kick a guy off a cliff, or silently stalk a base before blowing everything up—because why not?

And then there’s Vaas. Oh, Vaas. If there’s one character who’ll haunt your dreams (and probably your nightmares), it’s him. This maniacal villain gives you that rare mix of “I’m terrified of you” and “You’re so entertaining, I kind of want to hang out.” His unpredictable nature and crazy monologues about the nature of insanity make him one of the most memorable antagonists in gaming history. Far Cry 3 isn’t just a game about shooting your way through enemies; it’s about surviving the madness of the island, and Vaas is the personification of that madness. He’s like the chaos you can’t escape, and the story is just as gripping as it is insane. By the time you’re ready to confront him, you’ve been through so much that you’re not sure if you’re a hero or just another part of the island’s twisted ecosystem.

Now, here’s what makes Far Cry 3 truly special: the combination of freedom and danger. You can go from casually exploring the island, finding hidden treasures, and taking out outposts, to suddenly being ambushed by a wild animal, or caught in an intense firefight with pirates. The sense of danger is always present, and the unpredictability of the environment keeps you on your toes. The game’s combat mechanics are fluid and fun, giving you a wide array of weapons to choose from, whether you prefer a sniper rifle, a flamethrower, or the satisfying crack of a machete. But the real charm of the game lies in how it lets you approach everything. Want to sneak around and stealthily take out enemies? Go for it. Feel like causing absolute mayhem and blowing everything up? Knock yourself out. It’s a sandbox of possibilities with a dash of pure chaos. If you love open-world adventures where danger lurks around every corner and you get to be both the hunter and the hunted, Far Cry 3 is an absolute must-play. Highly recommend it to anyone who loves the genre!

183993347.review:
Pra quem jogou o 1 o 2 sabe a evolução ABSURDA que é esse Far Cry 3. 
O jogo começa com uma história simples mas que vai evoluindo com o passar da campanha. É um jogo de mundo aberto com opção de desenvolver itens e conquistar territórios. E falando sobre o vilão, ele é MUITO bom, bem desenvolvido, realmente faz você se sentir ameaçado. É um jogo de 2012 mas envelheceu muito bem, e ainda diverte bastante.

183924846.review:
[h1]My favorite Game[/h1]

Far Cry 3 is a game that holds a very special place in my heart. I’ve played it more than ten times over the years, and only recently did I finally purchase a legal copy of it. Playing it again felt like a blend of nostalgia and predictability. While I enjoyed revisiting its incredible world, knowing every twist, mission, and piece of dialogue by heart did take away some of the magic. Still, the game’s core elements make it an unforgettable experience every time.

The environment and soundtrack are among the best I’ve encountered in any game. The tropical island setting feels alive, with dense jungles, wide beaches, and treacherous cliffs creating a perfect playground for exploration and survival. The soundtrack deserves a special mention for how perfectly it fits the mood of the game. From intense action sequences to quieter, eerie moments in the wilderness, the music heightens every emotion and keeps you immersed in the world of Rook Island.

The protagonist, Jason Brody, is one of the reasons this game stands out. His journey from a scared, privileged man to a battle-hardened killer is fascinating and incredibly well-written. What makes his character truly captivating is the way he struggles with his transformation. Jason becomes a monster by the end of the story, but there’s still a part of him that recognizes his humanity and the mistakes he’s made along the way. It’s this conflict within him that makes his story feel so raw and real.

The supporting characters in Far Cry 3 are decent, though they vary in impact. Some, like your friends, don’t leave a lasting impression since their roles are mostly limited to being hostages or part of a rescue mission. However, Vaas Montenegro is an absolute standout. He is, without a doubt, one of the greatest video game antagonists ever created. His psychotic demeanor, unpredictability, and that iconic “definition of insanity” speech cement him as a character you can never forget. Every scene with him is intense, and he completely overshadows the second main villain, Hoyt Volker. While Hoyt is a decent antagonist in his own right, he simply doesn’t have the same charisma or depth as Vaas.

As for Citra, I’ve never been a fan of her character. From the start, she came across as manipulative and insincere, which made it impossible for me to trust her. In the end, I always chose to save my friends rather than follow her. She’s just not a character I could ever sympathize with or connect to, and her role in the story felt more like a distraction than a meaningful addition.

[h2]Far Cry 3 isn’t just a great game—it’s, in my opinion, the best entry in the Far Cry series. None of the later installments managed to capture the same balance of storytelling, gameplay, and atmosphere that this game achieved. 

[b]I know not everyone might agree with me, but for me, this game is a masterpiece. It’s not just one of my favorite games in the series but one of my favorite games of all time, if not the favorite.[/b][/h2]

[h1][b]My Rating: 10/10[/b] [/h1]

183887608.review:
Se Far Cry 1 foi aquele filme B de ação cheio de explosões e mutantes de CGI ruim, e Far Cry 2 era como um documentário de guerra deprimente com armas quebrando a cada dois tiros, Far Cry 3 chegou dizendo: “Pessoal, bora colocar uns personagens insanos, gráficos lindos e transformar isso aqui numa experiência que parece droga, mas é só um videogame mesmo.

Pontos Positivos:
Narrativa e personagens de respeito
Finalmente, um protagonista com personalidade! Jason Brody começa como aquele cara insuportável que grita quando vê um inseto, mas, ao longo do jogo, vira praticamente um Rambo de chinelo. É uma jornada de amadurecimento e loucura? Depende do ponto de vista.
O vilão Vaas é a estrela do show. Carismático, psicótico e com aquele monólogo sobre a definição de insanidade que virou meme. Ele é tipo o Heath Ledger dos videogames, mas com um facão na mão e um sorriso mais sinistro.
Ilha Tropical, Agora Com Wi-Fi de Emoção
Far Cry 3 te joga numa ilha que parece cenário de comercial de protetor solar, mas cheia de malucos armados até os dentes. Aqui você explora, caça, mergulha, escala torres, invade postos avançados e faz tudo o que seu coração de aventureiro quiser. É basicamente o Far Cry 1 com esteróides e mais opções.
Jogabilidade para todos os gostos
Você gosta de furtividade? Pode ser ninja. Prefere sair metendo bala? Só pegar o lança-chamas e gritar LIBERDADEEEEE. O jogo te dá ferramentas pra ser criativo nos combates.
O crafting também é genial.
Gráficos lindos de doer
O jogo é tão bonito que parece que você tá jogando dentro de uma tela de fundo do Windows. Por do sol, água cristalina, florestas densas um espetáculo. É o oposto da África seca e realista de Far Cry 2.
Diversão em primeiro lugar
Esqueça as armas quebrando ou a malária de Far Cry 2. Aqui, o foco é a diversão. Não precisa parar no meio do tiroteio pra consertar um rifle. Só atire, corra e faça parkour.

Pontos Negativos:
Vaas Aaparece menos que devia
Vaas é tão bom que, quando ele sai de cena, você sente um vazio. O segundo vilão, Hoyt, é tipo o substituto do professor: faz o trabalho, mas ninguém quer saber dele.
História com clichês de filme de sessão da tarde
O enredo é divertido, mas vamos combinar: Turistas sequestrados por piratas e um deles vira herói? Isso tem cheiro de roteiro reaproveitado de algum filme que o The Rock recusou fazer.
Mundo aberto sem consequências reais
Conquistar um posto avançado é legal, mas o jogo não muda muito com suas ações. Você é tipo aquele colega no trabalho que faz tudo, mas ninguém nota a diferença.
Menos realismo que Far Cry 2
Em Far Cry 3, você toma um tiro de AK-47 e cura com um band-aid. Em Far Cry 2, uma farpa no braço já era motivo pra sofrer. Pra quem gosta de realismo, essa mudança pode parecer meio caricata.
Missões lineares aqui e ali
Apesar do mundo aberto incrível, algumas missões principais te obrigam a seguir caminhos bem específicos. É tipo te oferecer um buffet, mas só te deixar comer o arroz.

Far Cry 3 é aquele primo mais legal da franquia, que chega com histórias malucas, memes, e uma vibe de "vamos nos divertir antes que o mundo acabe". Ele aprende com os erros dos antecessores e entrega um pacote que combina ação frenética, personagens marcantes e um mundo aberto pra você fazer o que quiser.
Se você ama Vaas e quer uma história que mistura psicologia e explosões, esse jogo é pra você. Só não espere perfeição: às vezes ele tropeça nos clichês, mas quem se importa? Com tanto fogo, tiroteio e tigres te perseguindo, nem dá tempo de reclamar.
10/10

Otherwise great classic game, but Ubisoft's separate launcher and lacking support kills it. 

As most Far Cry games this is meant to be the most fun playing co-op, but they've gutted the service (as with most classic games). And "thanks" to the ubisoft launcher it often just crashes.

Otherwise great classic game with a lot of cool stuff you can find only in older titles. Like the for-nowadays-standards perhaps excessive screenshake, which nontheless feels really authentic if you go off-road with a vehicle and gives genuine sense of danger if a wild animal's tearing at ya. Or the fact your inventory is limited unless you craft new bags outta animal skins. Nice stuff.

183709477.review:
Das erste mal richtig Far Cry 3 durchgezockt. Ist das Spiel echt aus 2012? Das Game sieht für das Alter echt Bombe aus! Oder gab es mal ein Grafik Update? War echt erstaunt.

Doch warum habe ich es gespielt, obwohl es keine Steam-Errungenschaften hat? Steam-Errungenschaften kommen bald bzw. sind evtl. schon drin, je nachdem, wann du es liest. Und wenn man die per Ubisoft vorher geholt hat, bekommt man die Steam-Errungenschaften später sofort.

Auf jeden Fall kann man sich Far Cry 3 gönnen. Die Geschichte ist jetzt nicht der Burner und viele Missionen sind einfach nur Füller. Aber das Game ist echt an manchen Spielen recht Schwer, vor allem, wenn die aus allen Richtungen kommen und selbst kaum bis kein Schutz hat. Und noch viel schlimmer, wenn man jemandem noch beschützen muss. Also habt immer genug Spritzen und grüne Pflanzen bei euch :D

Ansonsten gibt es in der Welt nichts zu sehen. Die Nebenmissionen muss man gar nicht machen, gibt es kein Erfolg für. Man muss nur alle Außenposten einnehmen, alle Funktürme aktivieren, 60 von 120 Relikte und alle Briefe/Speicherkarten sammeln. Dann noch andere Kleinigkeiten machen. Erfolge sind 3 von 10 (Leicht machbar). 

Es gibt hier keine Coop Erfolge mehr, da es die Online Funktion nicht mehr gibt. Aber komisch, dass in Ubisoft noch die 6 Coop Erfolge drin sind. Aber die werden sicherlich nicht in Steam rein kommen.

183602916.review:
Far Cry 3 é um marco nos jogos de mundo aberto e continua sendo referência até hoje. Com uma história envolvente, o jogo acompanha Jason Brody em uma jornada de sobrevivência e transformação, destacando-se pelo icônico vilão Vaas Montenegro, que rouba a cena com uma atuação incrível.

A ambientação na ilha tropical é um espetáculo à parte, oferecendo liberdade para explorar, caçar, invadir postos avançados e realizar missões paralelas. A jogabilidade é fluida, permitindo tanto furtividade quanto combate direto, além de um sistema de progressão que recompensa o jogador conforme ele se adapta aos desafios.

Apesar de alguns pontos negativos, como missões secundárias repetitivas e uma IA nem sempre consistente, o jogo se mantém sólido em sua proposta. Far Cry 3 é um clássico obrigatório para fãs de ação, narrativa envolvente e mundos abertos imersivos.

Nota: 9/10

183568680.review:
Геймплей-шикарен.Только в Far Cry 3 можно увидеть как ты убежал от тигра и спрятался,а он по инерции забежал на аванпост и всех там убил.10/10 бесшумных захватов.

Графика-хороша.С точки зрения графической части на 2012 год эталоном по графике я считаю Crysis 2.Far Cry 3 немного не дотягивает,на мой взгляд,но всё красиво,хорошо прорисовано,передана атмосфера экваториального острова идеально.

Сюжет-топовый.Реально хочется сопереживать Джейсону,его поискам брата,других.Не менее шикарно сделан антагонист ВААС и если честно один из самых харизматичных персонажей во всех играх на мой взгляд.

Музыка тоже отличная,гармонично вписывается.Диалоги пиратов про трипак от островитянок-бесценно.

Мультиплеер-к сожалению в 2016 году в мультиплеер уже мало кто играет,но в кооперативе пройти отдельную кампанию с кем-то людей ещё можно найти.

Атмосфера-отлично.Играя в игру полностью в неё погружаешься,забываешь про еду и сон."Ну ещё один аванпостик захвачу и спать".

Отдельно стоит выделить русскую озвучку,она неожиданно хороша.Некоторые герои даже ярче и самобытней получились если выбрать русский в настройках.

183543878.review:
This game is ruined by it's gameplay and crashing every 2 fucking seconds. You have to rewatch every cutscene when the game crashes or if you touch fire for a second and burn to death instantly. Vaas is cool, but it sucks that Jason is stupid and you have to deal with other characters for more than half the game. I don't believe Jason would ever have a relationship with how little he gives a fuck about his friends once they're in the pen. It would be nice if you got the wingsuit before the game fucking ended. Every hill I climb is just a place to slide down. They know which direction you will come from, but they so rarely give you hang gliders to use. You're also poor throughout this entire game, even if you do meticulously wait for the 3 second loot animation on every enemy you killed, after juggling their weapon off their body of course. This game has every single problem I have with 4, but at least 4 didn't crash all the time. It's very cool. I also enjoy when I miss a shot and suddenly the entire camp is looking exactly at my location. Very interesting stealth mechanics. It's even more fun when they put you in a car with the worst weapons possible and make you accurately snipe enemies with a pistol when you can't take cover and healing takes 30 minutes. There's maybe 20 minutes of the best Farcry in this game.


Update: I've now beat the game. I will say, the guns in the second half are so much better, but I still hate this game. 90% of the story missions are forced loud missions and/or protect someone on a turret. It's terrible. Who the fuck plays a Farcry game for a manning a turret? The only good part of this game was Vaas. 


Also
[spoiler] The ending is so fucking dogshit. First of all, this plan was dumb as fuck to begin with. Jason was fully armed sitting on the other side of Hoyt's desk when you first met him, but we couldn't do anything then? Really? Secondly, you get stuck in a poker game with Hoyt, and he has you dead to rights, but then you Mordekaiser ult him for a knife fight (idk where you got a knife) and suddenly the armed guards in the room are dead. 
What the fuck just happened? I know this also happened with Vaas, but at least I was already fucking armedand not held at gunpoint, and you could pretend most of your hallucination happened to some degree. I guess I was during the poker game too, but why can't I shoot people that matter?
After that, forced loud mission, running all the way to the airport because the half the vehicles are bugged, and the mortar destroys the rest. Very fun. Then, we get to the best part. We escape with Riley in a helicopter. He has never flown before, so it makes sense that it takes a bit to take off and he flails around some, but then, he claims to have gotten the hang of it and just slowly rides around 20ft off the ground so we can be shot by everyone on the planet. 
WE HAVE A FUCKING HELICOPTER, GO UP? 
Then you get back to crackhead and find out the crazy temple people kidnapped your friends to stop you from leaving. I feel like they were about to leave without Jason anyway; since he was dead set on revenge, and they thought Riley was dead. Why did Oliver (idk the friends names) think Riley was for sure dead? Who cares I guess. Anyways, I thought maybe they'd use the hallucinations to have me "accidentally" kill all my friends or something, but they just wanted them to scream at me and give me essentially the first choice of the game. It's so insane that the devs think this Jason could ever side with Citra, given how everything he just did was for saving Riley. Dennis also goes insane off screen for some extra conflict. Why would Jason even bother talking to Citra at this point, after all she's just done to betray his trust? 
You had a chance to show Jason so driven by revenge that he would ignore his friends in their time of need. Instead, you never make him choose anything. What if we had to choose between killing Hoyt and saving Riley? We might get a spec of character out of our incredibly deep protagonist. The only real conflict with his friends was him not having social skills. Even if you find it worth celebrating that you escaped in a shootout, maybe prioritize comforting the friends you just freed from brutal slavery. Oh yeah, also, I feel like he could've pulled his punches a little more on torturing his brother. Like, give him a little pain, but let him play it up. 
Stupid. How could anyone compare later Farcry games unfavorably to this? Farcry 4 is such a dramatic improvement in everything. 
[/spoiler]
